text: yona-e gwanhan iyagileul geudae ui baegseong-ege sang-gihalini geuneun hwa gana tteonamyeo hananim-i geuleul jeab haji moshalila chucheughaessnola geuleona geudo yeoggyeong-e cheohal ttaeneun sillo dangsin oeeneun sin-i eobsnani dangsinman-eul chan mihanaida jeoneun sillo joeindeul mu lijung-e iss-eossseubnida hadeola
